column2: bb<-barplot(counts, main = "Sample size by stage and sex", xlab = "Parental care stage", col=c("sienna2", "turquoise2"), legend= rownames(counts), legend.text=TRUE, args.legend=list(x=ncol(counts) + 1, y=max(colSums(counts)), bty = "n")) #hacky solution to making the legend not overlap with the bars
